column4: out of 1202 logged on members, how many do you think are actually looking right now?
I would really appreciate someone giving me a hand with my xorg.conf
basically finding my pci nvidea geforce fx 5500
and writing it correctly into xorg
I hav the same card
do you hav an onboard graphics card?
same here are you running fiesty or edgy
you can try restore your old xorg file or reconfigure it
ill tell you the commands then
open your xorg
do you have nvidia drivers installed?
sure np its a good thing
ya can you change the driver under devices to ubuntu
soory nvidia
gd can you add these options
now add Option "RenderAccel" "True"
done?
whats the error?
got to go revise 4 chinese test you can try sudo apt-get install nvidia-glx
not sure but sounds like you deleted sumthing else you can try dpkg-reconfigure xserver-sorg and then run through my instructions again
you need to go to screens in xorg and change the graphics card device name to the name in the device section
